tool_description: Given a natural language text description of a protein, this tool searches for the most relevant structural information of the protein.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: The natural language text description of the protein.
required_parameters.example: This protein is a transcription factor that regulates the expression of genes involved in cell cycle progression.

required_parameters.name: database
required_parameters.description: The specific database to search for protein structures.

return_values.name: protein_structure
return_values.description: The structure of the given protein.
